source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Novel Writing: Conflict, Suspense and Mystery
items.headline: Powerful Plot Techniques to Energize Your Fiction
objectives_summary: Use Conflict to drive your plot
Add Suspense to keep readers on the edge of their seat
Create some Mystery to make it hard to put your book down

items.title: Standup Comedy, Humorous Public Speaking, & Becoming Funnier
items.headline: Standup Comedy Complete: The Ultimate Guide To Humorous Public Speaking and Writing and Performing Jokes
objectives_summary: Standup Comedy and Humorous Public Speaking
Structure of jokes: Active joke writing so you can write jokes about anything
Passive joke writing: how to write jokes without trying

items.title: Creative Thinking | How To Be More CREATIVE
items.headline: Increase your Creative Brain Power in very simple steps
objectives_summary: The difference between CREATIVITY & INTELLIGENCE.
Barriers to Creativity and how to defeat them.
The FIVE TECHNIQUES to be more CREATIVE and how to apply each one of them in detail.

items.title: Get Your Screenplay Read And Sold

visible_instructors.name: Karel
visible_instructors.job_title: Pro Screenwriting Coach, Story Analyst, Lector and Producer
visible_instructors.title: Karel Segers

items.headline: Karel Segers shares from his 30+ years experience, and introduces you to professional screenplay marketing.
objectives_summary: Perform 7 critical revisions to your screenplay.
Polish your script to a professional, marketable standard.
Write a professional query letter, addressed to producers or agents.

items.title: Read Worthy Fiction

visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf

items.headline: 12 Weeks to Your Novel's 1st Draft
objectives_summary: Be able to apply the basic principles of novel writing
Start writing that novel

items.title: Alcohol Ink Learn to paint a Sea Turtle Easy Beginner Steps
items.headline: Alcohol Ink Painting on Yupo Paper Course step by step for all levels  - Create a lovely Sea Turtle swimming underwater
objectives_summary: Think of this course as a PAINT NIGHT Online!
This course is Quick and Easy, no heavy details and it's great for beginners.
This course is for all levels of Alcohol Ink painters or crafty/creative folks looking to create something in a short time!

items.title: How To Write Like J.K. Rowling
items.headline: A Bestselling Novelist Teaches You To Write Amazing Fiction That Readers (And Publishers!) Can’t Put Down
objectives_summary: Hook readers (and publishers) right from the first page
Understand how J.K. Rowling created books that sold nearly a billion copies.
Write your own vibrant characters that feel real and engaging

items.title: Screenwriting Forest: Write a Notable Screenplay in 95 Days

visible_instructors.name: Ansh
visible_instructors.job_title: Storyteller, Specialized in Screenwriting , Aspiring Author
visible_instructors.title: Ansh J

items.headline: The Art and Craft of Screenwriting in its entirety. Start from Basics to the Third Draft of your Screenplay in 95 Days!
objectives_summary: You will receive an in-depth knowledge of Screenwriting.
You will be ready with the Third Draft, of your High Concept Feature Length Screenplay.
You will have confidence in approaching Studios and like, to pitch and sell your Screenplay.

items.title: Let’s Write a Story
items.headline: A step-by-step walkthrough. Write your own story.
objectives_summary: How to use your own unique ideas to create an effective story structure.
An easy-to-follow guide to help you come up with new ideas and overcome writer’s block.
Key elements that need to be included in every story.

items.title: How to Become TV Presenter
items.headline: Improve Voice and Speech To Seek a Good Career As Television Presenter/Anchor/Host/Newscaster
objectives_summary: After Going through this short term course the learner will be confident enough to be a presenter in Front of the Camera.
After learning the exercises For Voice and Speech will improve in Performing in Front of the Camera.
May Even Become a Guide for other Learners too.

items.title: Boost Your Creativity Today-SOUZOU-
items.headline: Accelerate your imagination and learn how to make ideas happen
objectives_summary: How to boost your creativity
How to accelerate your imagination
How to convert your ideas into reality

items.title: Develop Your Spiritual Creativity God's Way

visible_instructors.name: Roma
visible_instructors.job_title: Vocal coach, songwriter, speaker & author. entreprenuer
visible_instructors.title: Roma Waterman

items.headline: A Christian Approach to Unleashing your God Given Creativity
objectives_summary: Hear from God for your future dreams;
Create with impact & release God's presence through your worship/art;
Overcome the root of rejection, brokenness & how to receive healing;

items.title: Acting Skills for a Better Life
items.headline: Develop the powerful skills of a trained actor for stage, film, TV or everyday life
objectives_summary: How acting contributes to storytelling
Why everybody can benefit from acting training
Basic tools of an actor: text, voice, body

items.title: How to Master simile, metaphor and figurative language.

visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf

items.headline: Get to the Heart of Imagery, give your novel new depth, and touch the hearts of your readers.
objectives_summary: Sell more books by engaging and immersing more readers faster.
Get your message across deeper and clearer with denser, more compelling prose

items.title: Novel Writing: Viewpoint, Voice and Tense
items.headline: Create the Very Best Narrator to Tell Your Story
objectives_summary: Choose the right viewpoint to control your readers' experience
Select a voice that conveys the mood of your story and the character of your protagonist
Apply a tense that keeps things natural yet exciting

items.title: Boost Your Creativity: The Random Word Doodle Workout
items.headline: Boost your ideas, sharpen your mind and get your brain into overdrive mode
objectives_summary: Come up with ideas quickly
Doodle quickly
Get started on projects easily
